Context:
George Brown College is committed to promoting a safe culture for bicycles, pedestrians, and motor vehicles on its campuses. Bikes are frequently stolen in Toronto, so it's recommended to secure bikes with good locks to the provided bicycle lock stands. The Toronto Police Services also recommend registering bicycles with them at www.torontopolice.on.ca/bike/, and they have a bicycle safety pamphlet available at www.torontopolice.on.ca/bike/registrationform.pdf.
